description: MASS Analytics offers marketing analytics & software solutions to help clients optimize their marketing spend, achieve maximum ROI and predict future performance.
Mastermaq is a software-house specializing in administrative, accounting, tax and people management solutions.
Matter is a branding agency in the Middle East that creates brands that elevate their respective markets and inspire consumer loyalty and capture their imagination.
Matternet’s on-demand, aerial delivery platform provides end-to-end solutions for healthcare, e-commerce and logistics organizations in urban environments.
Mawdoo3 is a comprehensive online Arabic content publisher.
MAX is a mobility platform that makes moto-taxis and 3-wheel taxis (known as Okadas and Kekes), safe, affordable, and accessible to underserved communities in Africa.
MaxMilhas connects people who want to sell miles to those who want to buy affordable airline tickets.
Meal Box is a food delivery service and a single stop solution for everyday nutritional needs of urban people bored of fast-food.

Mediastream is a streaming technology company that provides an end-to-end solution for major companies and broadcasters to connect with their audiences in a simple and effective way. It specializes in content administration and distribution, audiovisual production and user experience.
Médica Santa Carmen is an integrated renal health services provider offering prevention, diagnostics and therapeutic care to people living with and at high risk of developing chronic kidney disease.
Mediconecta provides on-demand remote health services via videoconference using in-house physician networks and a platform accessible by web, mobile app and point-of-care kiosks.
Medix offers technologically sophisticated, globally competitive infant and intensive-care medical devices.
Megatlon is Argentina’s leading chain of state-of-the-art gyms.
Memory develops accounting and administrative management software for SMEs.

Mensajeros Urbanos (MU) is a tech-driven logistics company that connects more than 25K retailers and CPG companies such as OXXO, McDonalds, and Falabella with last-mile delivery solutions in 18 cities throughout Colombia and Mexico.
Merchant Capital provides alternate sources of working capital for SMEs in South Africa.

Meru is a tech-enabled platform that connects Chinese manufacturers to customers in Mexico, providing the easiest and safest way to buy and bring inventory from Asian manufacturers to LatAm. Meru simplifies the wholesale process, so SMBs no longer have to deal with 5+ intermediaries in the supply chain and complex cross-border logistics.
Mesfix connects enterprises with independent investors through a crowdfactoring platform.

Metamaterial Technologies Inc. (MTI) is an innovator of advanced materials which are engineered at nanoscale to control light and other forms of energy. Its products employ lightweight raw materials and processes that consume less energy and offer superior performance across diverse applications.
Mi Aguila is an e-commerce and logistics solution focused on driving digital transformation for brick & mortar retailers in Latin America.
